ComicInfo.Penciller: Andrew Robinson,Nathan Fox,Peter Nguyen,Toby Cypress,Viktor Kalvachev,Viktor Kalvachev,Toby Cypress,Nathan Fox,Andrew Robinson,Peter Nguyen
ComicInfo.Title: Episode Eight: State of Shock
ComicInfo.Writer: Andrew Osborne,Viktor Kalvachev,Kosta Yanev,Viktor Kalvachev,Andrew Osborne,Kosta Yanev
ComicInfo.Summary: Secrets aren't the only things laid bare in the aftermath of a shocking reversal of fortune, while ticking time bombs of suspicion and paranoia threaten to blow a dangerous alliance to smithereens. Love is unspoken and promises are made to be broken in episode eight of the fast, funny 100% cool smash hit series. (But wait! There's more...at www.BlueEstateComic.com!)
ComicInfo.Characters: Johnny,Roy Devine Sr.,Vassilisa Shlyukha,Lupe,Don Luciano,Rachel Maddox,Roy Devine Jr.,Tony Luciano,Billy Ducharme,Lino,Sergey Ivanov,Vadim Petrovich Razov,Mauro
